name: Koldioxid Iteration 3 by Xavier Andersson Novela
name_original: Koldioxid Iteration 3 by Xavier Andersson Novela
description:
Short game project based on the theme Carbon Dioxide along with a few verbs that set the basis for gameplay mechanics.

The verbs were:

"warn"

"listen"

"Search"

This is an ongoing project.

The random black lines all over the screen were not there when I built the game for PC use and not WebGL, I am looking into this.
